description: News, features and multimedia from The New York Times on New York State politicians facing corruption charges, including State Assemblyman Sheldon Silver, the former speaker, and State Senator Dean G. Skelos, the former majority leader.
title: Albany on Trial
title_page: Albany on Trial - The New York Times
maintext:
Experts See Risks, and Logic, in Skelosesâ€™ Appeal for No Prison Time
Prosecutors are likely to seek stiff prison sentences for Dean G. Skelos, the former majority leader of the New York State Senate, and his son, Adam, who were both convicted on corruption charges.
